poem:
In buckets vast your keeps reside,
A shoreless lake where bytes abide.
Simple Storage Service, they say,
Your data's safe, come what may.
explanation: Amazon S3 is an object storage service to store and retrieve any amount of data from anywhere on the web.

poem:
Virtual machines in the cloud,
Elastic Compute, strong and proud.
Spin them up, shut them down,
Pay only for what you've found.
explanation: Amazon EC2 provides scalable computing capacity in the cloud, allowing you to launch virtual servers.

poem:
No servers to manage, no fuss,
Just code that runs when you must.
Serverless functions, quick and clean,
Lambda makes it all seem routine.
explanation: AWS Lambda lets you run code without provisioning or managing servers, paying only for compute time used.

poem:
Relational data, safe and sound,
Managed database, solid ground.
MySQL, PostgreSQL too,
RDS handles it all for you.
explanation: Amazon RDS is a managed relational database service that supports multiple database engines.

poem:
NoSQL database, fast and free,
Scales automatically, you'll see.
Key-value pairs, lightning quick,
DynamoDB does the trick.
explanation: Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service with seamless scalability.

poem:
बाल्टी में डेटा सुरक्षित रखो,
S3 में सब कुछ बचाओ।
स्टोरेज सर्विस सरल और सस्ती,
आपका डेटा हमेशा साफ़ और स्पष्ट।
explanation: Amazon S3 एक ऑब्जेक्ट स्टोरेज सर्विस है जो किसी भी मात्रा में डेटा स्टोर और पुनर्प्राप्त करने की अनुमति देती है।

poem:
क्लाउड में वर्चुअल मशीनें,
EC2 की शक्ति अद्भुत है।
बस और बंद करो जब चाहो,
केवल उपयोग के लिए भुगतान करो।
explanation: Amazon EC2 क्लाउड में स्केलेबल कंप्यूटिंग क्षमता प्रदान करता है।

poem:
सर्वर नहीं, कोड चलाओ,
Lambda में सब कुछ पाओ।
सर्वरलेस फंक्शन, तेज़ और साफ़,
बिना किसी प्रबंधन के।
explanation: AWS Lambda आपको सर्वर प्रोविजन या प्रबंधन के बिना कोड चलाने की अनुमति देता है।

poem:
બાલ્ટીમાં ડેટા સુરક્ષિત રાખો,
S3 માં બધું બચાવો।
સ્ટોરેજ સર્વિસ સરળ અને સસ્તી,
તમારો ડેટા હંમેશા સાફ અને સ્પષ્ટ।
explanation: Amazon S3 એક ઑબ્જેક્ટ સ્ટોરેજ સર્વિસ છે જે કોઈપણ માત્રામાં ડેટા સ્ટોર અને પુનઃપ્રાપ્ત કરવાની મંજૂરી આપે છે।

poem:
ક્લાઉડમાં વર્ચુઅલ મશીનો,
EC2 ની શક્તિ અદ્ભુત છે।
બસ અને બંધ કરો જ્યારે ઇચ્છો,
માત્ર ઉપયોગ માટે ચુકવણી કરો।
explanation: Amazon EC2 ક્લાઉડમાં સ્કેલેબલ કમ્પ્યુટિંગ ક્ષમતા પ્રદાન કરે છે।

poem:
સર્વર નહીં, કોડ ચલાવો,
Lambda માં બધું મેળવો।
સર્વરલેસ ફંક્શન, ઝડપી અને સાફ,
કોઈપણ વ્યવસ્થાપન વિના।
explanation: AWS Lambda તમને સર્વર પ્રોવિઝન અથવા વ્યવસ્થાપન વિના કોડ ચલાવવાની મંજૂરી આપે છે।

poem:
Content delivery, global reach,
Edge locations, fast for each.
CDN service, worldwide spread,
Faster loading, less delay.
explanation: Amazon CloudFront is a content delivery network that securely delivers data, videos, applications, and APIs to viewers globally.

poem:
Virtual private cloud, your own space,
Network isolation, secure place.
Subnets, gateways, control complete,
Your AWS resources, private and neat.
explanation: Amazon VPC lets you provision a logically isolated section of the AWS Cloud where you can launch AWS resources in a virtual network.

poem:
Identity and access, control who,
Users, groups, roles, permissions too.
Security first, least privilege,
IAM keeps your cloud safe and sage.
explanation: AWS IAM provides fine-grained access control across all of AWS, helping you secure your cloud resources.

poem:
Simple notification service,
Messages sent with ease.
Publish-subscribe pattern,
Reliable delivery, please.
explanation: Amazon SNS is a fully managed pub/sub messaging service that enables you to decouple microservices, distributed systems, and serverless applications.

poem:
Queue up your messages,
Simple queue service.
Asynchronous processing,
Reliable and diverse.
explanation: Amazon SQS is a fully managed message queuing service that enables you to decouple and scale microservices, distributed systems, and serverless applications.

poem:
Infrastructure as code,
Templates define your stack.
Automated deployment,
No more manual hack.
explanation: AWS CloudFormation gives you an easy way to model a set of related AWS and third-party resources, provision them quickly and consistently, and manage them throughout their lifecycles.

poem:
Real-time streaming data,
Kinesis handles the flow.
Process and analyze,
Insights that help you grow.
explanation: Amazon Kinesis makes it easy to collect, process, and analyze real-time, streaming data so you can get timely insights and react quickly to new information.

poem:
Data warehouse in the cloud,
Redshift scales with ease.
Analytics and insights,
Query performance that pleases.
explanation: Amazon Redshift is a fully managed, petabyte-scale data warehouse service in the cloud that makes it simple and cost-effective to analyze all your data using your existing business intelligence tools.
